TopicTitle: Constantly "Contract Log: Outdated save file detected!"

Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I have been playing with KSP 1.0.5 for ... well, since it was released, actually. I continued my old career, and the save works mostly fine.

Today I checked, and I still see this message in the debug menu after loading my savegame:

Quote

[Log]: Contract Log: Outdated save file detected! All contracts in save file were updated!

I tried saving/loading *that* state, and sure enough, the message came again. I started poking around my persistant.sfs file, but so far, I cannot spot anything that makes it different from a fresh 1.0.5 file.

The version of the Game is: version = 1.0.5, and in the SCENARIO ContractSystem, the version is 1.0.5.

What could be the cause of that?

Here is my persistance file: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/1414175/ksp/contract-updated-bug/persistent.sfs

Here is my mod list: 

Spoiler

KSP: 1.0.5 (Win32) - Unity: 4.6.4f1 - OS: Windows 8.1  (6.3.10240) 64bit
USI Tools - 0.5.5
Community Resource Pack - 0.4.8
Firespitter - 7.1.5
GCMonitor - 1.3
Interstellar Fuel Switch - 1.18
Kerbal Attachment System - 0.5.5
Kerbal Engineer Redux - 1.0.18
Kerbal Inventory System - 1.2.3
KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.5
MarkIVSystem - 0.2.1
Docking Port Alignment Indicator - 6.2
NearFutureElectrical - 0.6.1
PartCommander - 1.0.3
RCS Build Aid - 0.7.6
RemoteTech - 1.6.9
Kerbal Alarm Clock - 3.5
Alternate Resource Panel - 2.7.4
USI Core - 0.1.4
Freight Transport Tech - 0.4.4
Karibou - 0.1.2
Kolonization Core - 0.1.1
USI-LS - 0.3.5
USI Survivability Pack - 0.3.3
UKS - 0.32.2
Universal Storage - 1.1.0.8
Waypoint Manager - 2.4.4

 

What's also weird is that I almost never have any Contextual contracts. I Timewarped through 100 days, stopping every 5 days or so to get refreshed contracts, but only once or twice was there a contextual contract.

Is the probability really that low? Or is there something funky going on with my save?
Have you tried to reload you contract list from the alt+f12 menu? What if you get rid of all those completed contracts in your save game, does it still spawn that message?

15 hours ago, Benoit Hage said:

Have you tried to reload you contract list from the alt+f12 menu? What if you get rid of all those completed contracts in your save game, does it still spawn that message?

Thanks, I tried that now. Message still spawns
